sourcesContent:
<template lang="">
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col>
        <v-card>
          <v-form ref="form" class="pa-5" enctype="multipart/form-data">
            <v-text-field label="title" :rules="rules"></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field label="category" :rules="rules"></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field label="content" :rules="rules"></v-text-field>
            <v-file-input label="select image" :rules="rules"></v-file-input>
            <v-btn type="submit" color="primary">add</v-btn>
          </v-form>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      rules: [(value) => !!value || "this field is requied"],
      product: {
        title: "",
        category: "",
        content: "",
        image: "",
      },
      image: "",
    };
    me
  },
};
</script>
<style lang=""></style>
